About Me

Let me Tell you a few things...

Bio

First, after working 15 years as a auto technician I finally found my passion for coding that is something that I really enjoy doing. I can spend hours and hours writting codes.

Second, I'm a junior front-end web developer and a computer science student, and this identity will precise the path I intend to follow in 2019. I'm currently studying at New England Institute of Technology, so for the 2018 I had learned HTML & CSS, Fundamental of Javascript, PHP with MySQL Server, C++, C# and ASP.Net MVC. I'm going to try to master my skill to become a full stack developer. I also want to improve my design skills, by consuming content in online courses.

Software Engineer

Very dedicated and hard-working candidate who collaborate well with a team to achieve goals and company expectations. Highly motivated to learn Any new skill or languages. Able to work independently. Bilingual with fluency in English and Spanish. Currently in the last Semester of Software Engineer in New England Tech. Consistently gives 100% to employer.
